subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramirez, fresh off his 50-game drug suspension, will also have to deal with the New York news media when the Dodgers face the Mets on Tuesday.
snippet: Manny Ramirez, fresh off his 50-game drug suspension, will also have to deal with the New York news media when the Dodgers face the Mets on Tuesday.
